article.title: contact
article.para: The website is still quite new and we have several projects progressing at an alarming rate! We haven't yet set up a reliable way for you to contact us, though in the near future there will at the very least be a mailing list available.
In the meantime, should you wish to contact us, please leave a message or comment on our blog, Vimeo account or Flickr profile. Thank you for your patience!
